verbs.description: [ARG1: The G7 summit] [V: took] [ARG2: place] [ARGM-TMP: over two days] [ARGM-LOC: in Charlevoix , Quebec] . Photographers captured images of the palpable tension between US President Donald Trump and other world leaders before he pulled out of their joint trade communique .

The G7 summit took place over two days in Charlevoix , Quebec . [ARG0: Photographers] [V: captured] [ARG1: images of the palpable tension between US President Donald Trump and other world leaders] [ARGM-TMP: before he pulled out of their joint trade communique] .
